simple_transfer: ${name1} has ${initial} ${items} that ${subject1} ${has_have1} been collecting for a while. ${name1} gives ${transfer} of them to ${name2} as a gift. How many ${items} does ${name1} have now?

After counting ${his_her1} collection, ${name1} has ${initial} ${items}. ${subj1} give${verb_s1} ${transfer} to ${name2}. How many ${items} does ${name1} still have?

While ${subject} ${was_were} walking through the park on ${his_her} way to work, ${subject} ${find_verb}${verb_s} ${found} more ${items} lying on a bench.
